item.title: Theme Documentation - Basics
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Discover what the Hugo - LoveIt theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Content
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Find out how to create and organize your content quickly and intuitively in LoveIt theme.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Built-in Shortcodes
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Hugo provides multiple built-in shortcodes for author convenience and to keep your markdown content clean.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.author: venven
item.description: Data can be Breach We may be unaware of what’s really going on when we use our devices to access the internet. Well, this content will make you aware of what you should do when you use your favorite browser to access the internet. Hackers are eagerly pestering us to get our sensitive information, such as user credentials, passwords, credit card information, and the like. Specifically, this information is limited to Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome browsers, yet it may be similar to your favorite browser too.

item.title: Theme Documentation - Extended Shortcodes
item.author: Dillon
item.description: LoveIt theme provides multiple shortcodes on top of built-in ones in Hugo.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.author: Dillon
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

item.title: Theme Documentation - mermaid Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The mermaid shortcode supports diagrams in Hugo with Mermaid library.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Theme Documentation - echarts Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The echarts shortcode supports data visualization in Hugo with ECharts library.

item.title: Theme Documentation - mapbox Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The mapbox shortcode supports interactive maps in Hugo with Mapbox GL JS library.
